groq.place: Based on these coordinates: latitude {lat}, longitude {lng}, return only the name of the nearest city or place. Just one word or name, no sentence.
groq.weather: Based on these coordinates: latitude {lat}, longitude {lng}, return only the current temperature (e.g., "7°C"). Do not write a sentence or explanation, just one value.
groq.news: List 5 key global news headlines today. Just output a plain list, one per line. No introduction or extra text. No markdown or asterisks. No numbers.

1.title: Introduction
1.text: By accessing and using our platform ("Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part, please do not use the Service.

2.title: Eligibility
2.text: You must be at least 13 years old to use this Service. By registering, you represent and warrant that you meet this requirement.

3.title: Account Responsibility
3.text: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials. You are also fully responsible for all activities that occur under your account.

4.title: Acceptable Use

5.title: Content Ownership
5.text: You retain ownership of the content you post. However, by posting on our platform, you grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide license to display, distribute, and promote your content within the platform.

6.title: Termination
6.text: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the Service at any time and without notice, if we believe you have violated these Terms.

7.title: Privacy
7.text: Your personal data will be processed according to our Privacy Policy. By using the Service, you consent to such processing.

8.title: Modifications
8.text: We may revise these Terms from time to time. Continued use of the Service implies acceptance of the updated Terms.

9.title: Contact
9.text: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at

DigitalMarketingDescription: A group of people who collectively are responsible for all of the work necessary to produce working, validated assets.

about.title: About Bro World
about.intro1: Bro World is more than just a platform—it's your digital companion. Here, you can freely express yourself, share your thoughts, connect with others, and build your own digital space with powerful plugins that extend your experience.
about.intro2: Whether you're into blogging, running a store, chatting with friends, or organizing your time, Bro World adapts to you. Choose and install the plugins you need: Ecommerce, Calendar, Live Chat, CRM, Blog CMS, Games, and more.
about.intro3: We believe in freedom, creativity, and personalization. Bro World lets you build your own digital universe—one post, one plugin, and one connection at a time.
about.tech: Built with love using Vue 3, Vuetify 3 and Nuxt 3. Designed to be fast, modular and joyful.

questions.a1: Bro World is a social web platform where you can post, chat, and add functional plugins to customize your experience.
questions.q2: How do I install a plugin?
questions.a2: Go to the Plugins section. If the plugin is not installed, click on "Install". Once installed, it will be accessible via the "Open" button.
questions.a3: Yes, Bro World is free to use. Some plugins are free, while others may be marked as "Paid".
questions.q4: Can I post anything I want?
questions.a4: You can post freely, but please respect others. Any abusive, harmful, or illegal content may be removed according to our community guidelines.
questions.a5: Bro World is built by a passionate developer who believes in freedom, creativity, and social connection through modern web technologies.
